CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 29, 1961, pg. 1, reads: "'Assault Wave' - Pittsburgh Steeler foes will find 280-pound Eugene (Big Daddy) Lipscomb a one-man assault wave' this fall."Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 29, 1961, pg. 24, reads: "Nine Negroes Among 22 Steeler Hopefuls - Here, on the campus of Slippery Rock State Teachers College, Tuesday morning, the eager but cold eyes of Coach Buddy Parker were weighing the muscular symphony of 22 individual 1961 Pittsburgh Steelers' rookies, nine of whom were young men of color..."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Steelers football player, #76 Eugene "Big Daddy" Lipscomb, standing on field with arms outstretched, at Steelers camp, Slippery Rock State Teachers College
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Pittsburgh Steelers (Football team).Football players--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Lipscomb, Eugene "Big Daddy."Uniforms--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Portraits--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Slippery Rock State Teachers College.Men--Portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
